alert.note: Alert for Ashland (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 17 at 7:32PM CST until November 18 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches, except up to 10 inches for some of the Apostle Islands. * WHERE...Ashland County. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Bad River Reservation. * WHEN...Until 6 AM CST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Lake effect snow totals up to 5 inches in the last 3 hours have been reported in the tip of the Bayfield Peninsula, and is suspected to be impacting the Apostle Islands as well. These heavy snowfall rates will cause significantly higher totals than previously forecasted.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Road conditions can also be found at 511mn.org for Minnesota or 511wi.gov for Wisconsin.
